name: Shutter Stock
describe: Full-stack niche-related website & users can sign up & log in via custom or Google. Fully responsive UI with slider, spinner & hover effect. Users can book or purchase a product, cancel an order & add review. Have Admin & User dashboard. Admin can delete, add, manage services & can make a user admin.
